titles: A godlie dreame compiled by Elizabeth Melvill, Ladie Culros younger, at the request of a friend.
author: Colville, Elizabeth Melvill, Lady Colville of Culros, fl. 1603.
notes: Includes "A verie comfortable song, to the tune of Shall I let her goe?"
Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
